TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnHeader extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ICloneable

type ColumnHeader = class inherit Component interface ICloneable

summary.span: 在 控件中显示一个列标题。

span.span: Displays a single column header in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列标题是包含标题文本的 控件中的项。A column header is an item in a control that contains heading text. 可以使用 类的 方法将 对象添加到 中。 objects can be added to a using the method of the class. 若要将一组列添加到 ，可以使用 类的 方法。To add a group of columns to a , you can use the method of the class. 您可以使用 类的 属性来确定 在 中的位置。You can use the property of the class to determine where the is located in the . 提供 和 属性，以设置控件中显示的文本以及列标题中文本的对齐方式。 provides the and properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header. 若要确定 是否与 控件相关联，可以引用 属性。To determine whether a is associated with a control, you can reference the property. 如果要复制 以便在其他 控件中使用，则可以使用 方法。If you want to copy a for use in another control, you can use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还将项和子项添加到 中。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用 `PopulateListView` 方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法仅在构造了 并且包含已构造的 并使用项填充列后才有效。Calling the method is only effective once the and containing have been constructed, and the column is populated with items. 如果将新项添加到 ，则除非再次调用 ，否则列将不会调整大小。If new items are added to the , the column will not resize unless is called again.

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收将其占用的内存回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收调用 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放 正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the .

value.span: 显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: The index of the image displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指由包含 的 的 属性指定的图像的索引。The property refers to the index of an image specified by the property of the that contains the . 如果在包含 上没有设置 ，则 属性返回-1。The property returns -1 if there is no set on the containing . 列中显示的图像通常用于指示列中项的状态。The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column. 和 相互排斥，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 与 关联的图像通常用于指示状态信息。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information. 如果将 设置为大于关联图像列表中最后一项的索引值，则 将设置为图像列表中最后一项的索引。If you set the to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.

span.span: is less than -1.

member this.ImageKey : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在列中的图像的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.

value.span: 显示在列中的图像的键。

span.span: The key of the image displayed in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks "" 和 "" 属性是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则其他属性将被设置为无效值并被忽略。The and properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果 设置为无效值，则不会显示图像，且不会引发异常。If is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown. 与 关联的图像通常用于指示状态信息。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值不一定对应于 中列标题的当前可视位置。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the . 这可能是由于用户在运行时对列标题重新排序（当 属性设置为 `true`）。This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the property is set to `true`). 如果 未包含在 控件中，此属性将返回值-1。If the is not contained within a control this property returns a value of -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中所显示文本的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性为每个 中显示的文本提供不同的文本对齐方式设置。You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each . > [!NOTE] > 由于基础控件中的限制，此属性不会对 控件中的第一列产生影响，该控件始终靠左对齐。Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the control, which is always aligned to the left. 若要在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]中解决此限制，可以处理 事件，并自己绘制列标题。To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the event and paint the column header yourself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还将项和子项添加到 中。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用 `PopulateListView` 方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the column.

value.span: 列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width of the column, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使你能够设置 的 。This property enables you to set the of the . 可以将 设置为在运行时调整为列内容或标题。The can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading. 若要调整列中最大项的宽度，请将 属性设置为-1。To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the property to -1. 若要调整到列标题的宽度，请将 属性设置为-2。To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the property to -2. > [!NOTE] > 当所有列的组合宽度超过32768像素时，可能会产生意外行为。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还将项和子项添加到 中。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用 `PopulateListView` 方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]
